allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add auto-restart, fix power-ups, and add unique sound effects

- Add 25-second auto-restart countdown after game over with UI display
- Fix power-up collision detection (use CollisionGroup.ENTITY instead of PLAYER)
- Improve power-up visibility: larger models (1.5x scale), higher spawn (2.5 blocks), more noticeable bobbing
- Restrict power-up spawning to Tier 1 zones only for better accessibility
- Fix power-up models: use emerald for Flood Freeze, golden-apple for Animal Magnet
- Prevent FloodManager from applying physics to kinematic PowerUpEntity
- Add unique sound effects for all game events (countdown, animal pickup/release, game over, wrong pair)
- Add comprehensive debug logging for power-up spawning and collection
